section.title: Release 23.05 (“Stoat”, 2023.05/??)
section.para: Support is planned until the end of December 2023, handing over to 23.11.

section.title: Highlights
section.para: In addition to numerous new and upgraded packages, this release has the following highlights:

carnix and cratesIO has been removed due to being unmaintained, use alternatives such as naersk and crate2nix instead.
